sentences.sContent: More timbers are needed to bolster the roof of the mine.
sentences.sContent_eng: More timbers are needed to bolster the roof of the mine.
sentences.sCn: 需要更多的木材支撑矿顶。

sentences.sContent: If you have a bolster or several pillows, place your lower back onto the support.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you have a bolster or several pillows, place your lower back onto the support.
sentences.sCn: 如果你有一个支撑或者一些枕头，将你的下半身靠在这些支撑上。

phrases.pCn: 护索板；支承板；压床垫板

trans.tranOther: a long firm  pillow  , usually shaped like a tube
